pageContext.claim: “You mentioned Afghanistan. I think we've made a lot of great strides recently in Afghanistan. It's -- we call it the "endless war." Nineteen years. The real number is 19 years.”
pageContext.analysis: The United States attacked Afghanistan a few weeks after the Sept. 11 attacks in 2001, so at the time of this comment, the United States had been fighting there 17 1/2 years.
